alert.note: Alert for Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 09 at 8:59PM CDT until July 10 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT FOR SOUTHWESTERN TALLADEGA COUNTY... At 859 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated 2 to 4 inches of rain fell earlier. Heavy rain has ended but some lingering flooding may remain especially around McGowan`s Ferry Road. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sylacauga, Childersburg, Wilsonville, Talladega Springs, Oak Grove, Fayetteville, Lay Lake, Varnons, Sylacauga Municipal Airport, Gantts Quarry, Cedar Creek and Mignon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
